original_title: The Boys In Blue 2: Still Blue
overview: The Boys In Blue™ are back, and blood thirsty for more action. With a new D.A, a new Commissioner, and a new Chief, will the Boys™ be able to set aside their differences and combat true evil to save the president? Find out in this action epic, lauded for its sweeping fight scenes and its swooning romance.
tagline: Crime just Blue up, and only two men can save America.
title: The Boys In Blue 2: Still Blue
